news.title: Trump's trade war shift away from Chinese manufacturing has reached tipping point
news.description: A long-term supply chain shift is pulling the rest of Asia even with manufacturing giant China. For importers, a short-term cash crunch from tariffs is looming.

news.title: Stock futures are little changed after Wall Street notches back-to-back winning weeks: Live updates
news.description: The three major indexes are coming off their second straight winning weeks.

news.title: Beef prices are soaring. Here's why America is facing record-low cattle numbers
news.description: Beef prices are up about 15% over the past year as ranchers face record low cattle herds amidst years of drought throughout U.S. farmlands.
